headline: British American Tobacco: Trading Update Affirms Attractiveness
summary: British American Tobacco stock has rebounded over 10% since October. The stock's forward P/E is also competitive compared with peers. Read why BTI stock is a Buy.

headline: Philip Morris International Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend of $1.35 Per Share
summary: STAMFORD, CT, December 12, 2024--Regulatory News: The Board of Directors of Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE: PM) today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.35 per common share, payable on January 13, 2025, to shareholders of record as of December 26, 2024. The ex-dividend date is December 26, 2024. For more details on stock, dividends and other information, see www.pmi.com/dividend.
